title: A Bike Fit for Royalty? 3T Builds Custom Bike for Prince Alberto II of Monaco
content:
If you love salivating over custom bikes, then you'll probably dig on 3T's latest one-off for Monaco's prince.

The post A Bike Fit for Royalty? 3T Builds Custom Bike for Prince Alberto II of Monaco appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Andrew McLemore
